## Description



---

## Acceptance Criteria
```gherkin
# AC-1: <Clear and testable capability>

  # AC-1.1
  Scenario: <Concise scenario title>
    Given <initial state>
      And <another prerequisite>
    When <user performs an action>
      And <additional action if needed>
    Then <observable outcome>
      And <secondary outcome>
      And <edge case validation if relevant>

# AC-2: <Second capability or behavioral grouping>

  # AC-2.1
  Scenario: <Concise scenario title>
    Given <initial state>
      And <supporting condition>
    When <trigger action>
      And <follow up step>
    Then <expected outcome>
      And <additional observable effect>

  # AC-2.2
  Scenario: <Concise scenario title>
    Given <initial state>
      And <required setup>
    When <actor initiates action>
      And <subsequent action>
    Then <validated result>
      And <secondary validation>
      And <optional boundary check>
```
